26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_mmu_base.c,v 1.5 2019/03/18 02:01:41 mrg Exp $");
28
29#include "priv.h"
30
31#include <core/gpuobj.h>
32#include <subdev/fb.h>
33
34void
35nvkm_vm_map_at(struct nvkm_vma *vma, u64 delta, struct nvkm_mem *node)
36{
37 struct nvkm_vm *vm = vma->vm;
38 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
39 struct nvkm_mm_node *r;
40 int big = vma->node->type != mmu->func->spg_shift;
41 u32 offset = vma->node->offset + (delta >> 12);
42 u32 bits = vma->node->type - 12;
43 u32 pde = (offset >> mmu->func->pgt_bits) - vm->fpde;
44 u32 pte = (offset & ((1 << mmu->func->pgt_bits) - 1)) >> bits;
45 u32 max = 1 << (mmu->func->pgt_bits - bits);
46 u32 end, len;
47
48 delta = 0;
49 list_for_each_entry(r, &node->regions, rl_entry) {
50 u64 phys = (u64)r->offset << 12;
51 u32 num = r->length >> bits;
52
53 while (num) {
54 struct nvkm_memory *pgt = vm->pgt[pde].mem[big];
55
56 end = (pte + num);
57 if (unlikely(end >= max))
58 end = max;
59 len = end - pte;
60
61 mmu->func->map(vma, pgt, node, pte, len, phys, delta);
62
63 num -= len;
64 pte += len;
65 if (unlikely(end >= max)) {
66 phys += len << (bits + 12);
67 pde++;
68 pte = 0;
69 }
70
71 delta += (u64)len << vma->node->type;
72 }
73 }
74
75 mmu->func->flush(vm);
76}
77
78#ifdef __NetBSD__
79
80static void
81nvkm_vm_map_sg(struct nvkm_vma *vma, u64 delta, u64 length,
82 struct nvkm_mem *mem)
83{
84 struct nvkm_vm *vm = vma->vm;
85 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
86 int big = vma->node->type != mmu->func->spg_shift;
87 u32 offset = vma->node->offset + (delta >> 12);
88 u32 bits = vma->node->type - 12;
89 u32 num = length >> vma->node->type;
90 u32 pde = (offset >> mmu->func->pgt_bits) - vm->fpde;
91 u32 pte = (offset & ((1 << mmu->func->pgt_bits) - 1)) >> bits;
92 u32 max = 1 << (mmu->func->pgt_bits - bits);
93 unsigned seg, pgoff;
94
95 for (seg = 0; seg < mem->pages->dm_nsegs; seg++) {
96 struct nvkm_memory *pgt = vm->pgt[pde].mem[big];
97 dma_addr_t addr = mem->pages->dm_segs[seg].ds_addr;
98
99 KASSERT((mem->pages->dm_segs[seg].ds_len & NOUVEAU_GPU_PAGE_MASK) == 0);
100 for (pgoff = 0; pgoff < mem->pages->dm_segs[seg].ds_len;
101 pgoff += NOUVEAU_GPU_PAGE_SIZE, addr += NOUVEAU_GPU_PAGE_SIZE) {
102 mmu->func->map_sg(vma, pgt, mem, pte, 1, &addr);
103 num--;
104 pte++;
105
106 if (num == 0)
107 goto finish;
108
109 if (__predict_false(pte >= max)) {
110 pde++;
111 pte = 0;
112 }
113 }
114 }
115
116finish:
117 mmu->func->flush(vm);
118}
119
120#else
121
122static void
123nvkm_vm_map_sg_table(struct nvkm_vma *vma, u64 delta, u64 length,
124 struct nvkm_mem *mem)
125{
126 struct nvkm_vm *vm = vma->vm;
127 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
128 int big = vma->node->type != mmu->func->spg_shift;
129 u32 offset = vma->node->offset + (delta >> 12);
130 u32 bits = vma->node->type - 12;
131 u32 num = length >> vma->node->type;
132 u32 pde = (offset >> mmu->func->pgt_bits) - vm->fpde;
133 u32 pte = (offset & ((1 << mmu->func->pgt_bits) - 1)) >> bits;
134 u32 max = 1 << (mmu->func->pgt_bits - bits);
135 unsigned m, sglen;
136 u32 end, len;
137 int i;
138 struct scatterlist *sg;
139
140 for_each_sg(mem->sg->sgl, sg, mem->sg->nents, i) {
141 struct nvkm_memory *pgt = vm->pgt[pde].mem[big];
142 sglen = sg_dma_len(sg) >> PAGE_SHIFT;
143
144 end = pte + sglen;
145 if (unlikely(end >= max))
146 end = max;
147 len = end - pte;
148
149 for (m = 0; m < len; m++) {
150 dma_addr_t addr = sg_dma_address(sg) + (m << PAGE_SHIFT);
151
152 mmu->func->map_sg(vma, pgt, mem, pte, 1, &addr);
153 num--;
154 pte++;
155
156 if (num == 0)
157 goto finish;
158 }
159 if (unlikely(end >= max)) {
160 pde++;
161 pte = 0;
162 }
163 if (m < sglen) {
164 for (; m < sglen; m++) {
165 dma_addr_t addr = sg_dma_address(sg) + (m << PAGE_SHIFT);
166
167 mmu->func->map_sg(vma, pgt, mem, pte, 1, &addr);
168 num--;
169 pte++;
170 if (num == 0)
171 goto finish;
172 }
173 }
174
175 }
176finish:
177 mmu->func->flush(vm);
178}
179
180static void
181nvkm_vm_map_sg(struct nvkm_vma *vma, u64 delta, u64 length,
182 struct nvkm_mem *mem)
183{
184 struct nvkm_vm *vm = vma->vm;
185 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
186 dma_addr_t *list = mem->pages;
187 int big = vma->node->type != mmu->func->spg_shift;
188 u32 offset = vma->node->offset + (delta >> 12);
189 u32 bits = vma->node->type - 12;
190 u32 num = length >> vma->node->type;
191 u32 pde = (offset >> mmu->func->pgt_bits) - vm->fpde;
192 u32 pte = (offset & ((1 << mmu->func->pgt_bits) - 1)) >> bits;
193 u32 max = 1 << (mmu->func->pgt_bits - bits);
194 u32 end, len;
195
196 while (num) {
197 struct nvkm_memory *pgt = vm->pgt[pde].mem[big];
198
199 end = (pte + num);
200 if (unlikely(end >= max))
201 end = max;
202 len = end - pte;
203
204 mmu->func->map_sg(vma, pgt, mem, pte, len, list);
205
206 num -= len;
207 pte += len;
208 list += len;
209 if (unlikely(end >= max)) {
210 pde++;
211 pte = 0;
212 }
213 }
214
215 mmu->func->flush(vm);
216}
217
218#endif
219
220void
221nvkm_vm_map(struct nvkm_vma *vma, struct nvkm_mem *node)
222{
223#ifndef __NetBSD__
224 if (node->sg)
225 nvkm_vm_map_sg_table(vma, 0, node->size << 12, node);
226 else
227#endif
228 if (node->pages)
229 nvkm_vm_map_sg(vma, 0, node->size << 12, node);
230 else
231 nvkm_vm_map_at(vma, 0, node);
232}
233
234void
235nvkm_vm_unmap_at(struct nvkm_vma *vma, u64 delta, u64 length)
236{
237 struct nvkm_vm *vm = vma->vm;
238 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
239 int big = vma->node->type != mmu->func->spg_shift;
240 u32 offset = vma->node->offset + (delta >> 12);
241 u32 bits = vma->node->type - 12;
242 u32 num = length >> vma->node->type;
243 u32 pde = (offset >> mmu->func->pgt_bits) - vm->fpde;
244 u32 pte = (offset & ((1 << mmu->func->pgt_bits) - 1)) >> bits;
245 u32 max = 1 << (mmu->func->pgt_bits - bits);
246 u32 end, len;
247
248 while (num) {
249 struct nvkm_memory *pgt = vm->pgt[pde].mem[big];
250
251 end = (pte + num);
252 if (unlikely(end >= max))
253 end = max;
254 len = end - pte;
255
256 mmu->func->unmap(vma, pgt, pte, len);
257
258 num -= len;
259 pte += len;
260 if (unlikely(end >= max)) {
261 pde++;
262 pte = 0;
263 }
264 }
265
266 mmu->func->flush(vm);
267}
268
269void
270nvkm_vm_unmap(struct nvkm_vma *vma)
271{
272 nvkm_vm_unmap_at(vma, 0, (u64)vma->node->length << 12);
273}
274
275static void
276nvkm_vm_unmap_pgt(struct nvkm_vm *vm, int big, u32 fpde, u32 lpde)
277{
278 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
279 struct nvkm_vm_pgd *vpgd;
280 struct nvkm_vm_pgt *vpgt;
281 struct nvkm_memory *pgt;
282 u32 pde;
283
284 for (pde = fpde; pde <= lpde; pde++) {
285 vpgt = &vm->pgt[pde - vm->fpde];
286 if (--vpgt->refcount[big])
287 continue;
288
289 pgt = vpgt->mem[big];
290 vpgt->mem[big] = NULL;
291
292 list_for_each_entry(vpgd, &vm->pgd_list, head) {
293 mmu->func->map_pgt(vpgd->obj, pde, vpgt->mem);
294 }
295
296 mmu->func->flush(vm);
297
298 nvkm_memory_del(&pgt);
299 }
300}
301
302static int
303nvkm_vm_map_pgt(struct nvkm_vm *vm, u32 pde, u32 type)
304{
305 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
306 struct nvkm_vm_pgt *vpgt = &vm->pgt[pde - vm->fpde];
307 struct nvkm_vm_pgd *vpgd;
308 int big = (type != mmu->func->spg_shift);
309 u32 pgt_size;
310 int ret;
311
312 pgt_size = (1 << (mmu->func->pgt_bits + 12)) >> type;
313 pgt_size *= 8;
314
315 ret = nvkm_memory_new(mmu->subdev.device, NVKM_MEM_TARGET_INST,
316 pgt_size, 0x1000, true, &vpgt->mem[big]);
317 if (unlikely(ret))
318 return ret;
319
320 list_for_each_entry(vpgd, &vm->pgd_list, head) {
321 mmu->func->map_pgt(vpgd->obj, pde, vpgt->mem);
322 }
323
324 vpgt->refcount[big]++;
325 return 0;
326}
327
328int
329nvkm_vm_get(struct nvkm_vm *vm, u64 size, u32 page_shift, u32 access,
330 struct nvkm_vma *vma)
331{
332 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
333 u32 align = (1 << page_shift) >> 12;
334 u32 msize = size >> 12;
335 u32 fpde, lpde, pde;
336 int ret;
337
338 mutex_lock(&vm->mutex);
339 ret = nvkm_mm_head(&vm->mm, 0, page_shift, msize, msize, align,
340 &vma->node);
341 if (unlikely(ret != 0)) {
342 mutex_unlock(&vm->mutex);
343 return ret;
344 }
345
346 fpde = (vma->node->offset >> mmu->func->pgt_bits);
347 lpde = (vma->node->offset + vma->node->length - 1) >> mmu->func->pgt_bits;
348
349 for (pde = fpde; pde <= lpde; pde++) {
350 struct nvkm_vm_pgt *vpgt = &vm->pgt[pde - vm->fpde];
351 int big = (vma->node->type != mmu->func->spg_shift);
352
353 if (likely(vpgt->refcount[big])) {
354 vpgt->refcount[big]++;
355 continue;
356 }
357
358 ret = nvkm_vm_map_pgt(vm, pde, vma->node->type);
359 if (ret) {
360 if (pde != fpde)
361 nvkm_vm_unmap_pgt(vm, big, fpde, pde - 1);
362 nvkm_mm_free(&vm->mm, &vma->node);
363 mutex_unlock(&vm->mutex);
364 return ret;
365 }
366 }
367 mutex_unlock(&vm->mutex);
368
369 vma->vm = NULL;
370 nvkm_vm_ref(vm, &vma->vm, NULL);
371 vma->offset = (u64)vma->node->offset << 12;
372 vma->access = access;
373 return 0;
374}
375
376void
377nvkm_vm_put(struct nvkm_vma *vma)
378{
379 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu;
380 struct nvkm_vm *vm;
381 u32 fpde, lpde;
382
383 if (unlikely(vma->node == NULL))
384 return;
385 vm = vma->vm;
386 mmu = vm->mmu;
387
388 fpde = (vma->node->offset >> mmu->func->pgt_bits);
389 lpde = (vma->node->offset + vma->node->length - 1) >> mmu->func->pgt_bits;
390
391 mutex_lock(&vm->mutex);
392 nvkm_vm_unmap_pgt(vm, vma->node->type != mmu->func->spg_shift, fpde, lpde);
393 nvkm_mm_free(&vm->mm, &vma->node);
394 mutex_unlock(&vm->mutex);
395
396 nvkm_vm_ref(NULL, &vma->vm, NULL);
397}
398
399int
400nvkm_vm_boot(struct nvkm_vm *vm, u64 size)
401{
402 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
403 struct nvkm_memory *pgt;
404 int ret;
405
406 ret = nvkm_memory_new(mmu->subdev.device, NVKM_MEM_TARGET_INST,
407 (size >> mmu->func->spg_shift) * 8, 0x1000, true, &pgt);
408 if (ret == 0) {
409 vm->pgt[0].refcount[0] = 1;
410 vm->pgt[0].mem[0] = pgt;
411 nvkm_memory_boot(pgt, vm);
412 }
413
414 return ret;
415}
416
417int
418nvkm_vm_create(struct nvkm_mmu *mmu, u64 offset, u64 length, u64 mm_offset,
419 u32 block, struct lock_class_key *key, struct nvkm_vm **pvm)
420{
421 static struct lock_class_key _key;
422 struct nvkm_vm *vm;
423 u64 mm_length = (offset + length) - mm_offset;
424 int ret;
425
426 vm = kzalloc(sizeof(*vm), GFP_KERNEL);
427 if (!vm)
428 return -ENOMEM;
429
430 __mutex_init(&vm->mutex, "&vm->mutex", key ? key : &_key);
431 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&vm->pgd_list);
432 vm->mmu = mmu;
433 kref_init(&vm->refcount);
434 vm->fpde = offset >> (mmu->func->pgt_bits + 12);
435 vm->lpde = (offset + length - 1) >> (mmu->func->pgt_bits + 12);
436
437 vm->pgt = vzalloc((vm->lpde - vm->fpde + 1) * sizeof(*vm->pgt));
438 if (!vm->pgt) {
439#ifdef __NetBSD__
440 linux_mutex_destroy(&vm->mutex);
441#else
442 mutex_destroy(&vm->mutex);
443#endif
444 kfree(vm);
445 return -ENOMEM;
446 }
447
448 ret = nvkm_mm_init(&vm->mm, mm_offset >> 12, mm_length >> 12,
449 block >> 12);
450 if (ret) {
451 vfree(vm->pgt);
452#ifdef __NetBSD__
453 linux_mutex_destroy(&vm->mutex);
454#else
455 mutex_destroy(&vm->mutex);
456#endif
457 kfree(vm);
458 return ret;
459 }
460
461 *pvm = vm;
462
463 return 0;
464}
465
466int
467nvkm_vm_new(struct nvkm_device *device, u64 offset, u64 length, u64 mm_offset,
468 struct lock_class_key *key, struct nvkm_vm **pvm)
469{
470 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = device->mmu;
471 if (!mmu->func->create)
472 return -EINVAL;
473 return mmu->func->create(mmu, offset, length, mm_offset, key, pvm);
474}
475
476static int
477nvkm_vm_link(struct nvkm_vm *vm, struct nvkm_gpuobj *pgd)
478{
479 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = vm->mmu;
480 struct nvkm_vm_pgd *vpgd;
481 int i;
482
483 if (!pgd)
484 return 0;
485
486 vpgd = kzalloc(sizeof(*vpgd), GFP_KERNEL);
487 if (!vpgd)
488 return -ENOMEM;
489
490 vpgd->obj = pgd;
491
492 mutex_lock(&vm->mutex);
493 for (i = vm->fpde; i <= vm->lpde; i++)
494 mmu->func->map_pgt(pgd, i, vm->pgt[i - vm->fpde].mem);
495 list_add(&vpgd->head, &vm->pgd_list);
496 mutex_unlock(&vm->mutex);
497 return 0;
498}
499
500static void
501nvkm_vm_unlink(struct nvkm_vm *vm, struct nvkm_gpuobj *mpgd)
502{
503 struct nvkm_vm_pgd *vpgd, *tmp;
504
505 if (!mpgd)
506 return;
507
508 mutex_lock(&vm->mutex);
509 list_for_each_entry_safe(vpgd, tmp, &vm->pgd_list, head) {
510 if (vpgd->obj == mpgd) {
511 list_del(&vpgd->head);
512 kfree(vpgd);
513 break;
514 }
515 }
516 mutex_unlock(&vm->mutex);
517}
518
519static void
520nvkm_vm_del(struct kref *kref)
521{
522 struct nvkm_vm *vm = container_of(kref, typeof(*vm), refcount);
523 struct nvkm_vm_pgd *vpgd, *tmp;
524
525 list_for_each_entry_safe(vpgd, tmp, &vm->pgd_list, head) {
526 nvkm_vm_unlink(vm, vpgd->obj);
527 }
528
529 nvkm_mm_fini(&vm->mm);
530 vfree(vm->pgt);
531#ifdef __NetBSD__
532 linux_mutex_destroy(&vm->mutex);
533#else
534 mutex_destroy(&vm->mutex);
535#endif
536 kfree(vm);
537}
538
539int
540nvkm_vm_ref(struct nvkm_vm *ref, struct nvkm_vm **ptr, struct nvkm_gpuobj *pgd)
541{
542 if (ref) {
543 int ret = nvkm_vm_link(ref, pgd);
544 if (ret)
545 return ret;
546
547 kref_get(&ref->refcount);
548 }
549
550 if (*ptr) {
551 nvkm_vm_unlink(*ptr, pgd);
552 kref_put(&(*ptr)->refcount, nvkm_vm_del);
553 }
554
555 *ptr = ref;
556 return 0;
557}
558
559static int
560nvkm_mmu_oneinit(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
561{
562 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = nvkm_mmu(subdev);
563 if (mmu->func->oneinit)
564 return mmu->func->oneinit(mmu);
565 return 0;
566}
567
568static int
569nvkm_mmu_init(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
570{
571 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = nvkm_mmu(subdev);
572 if (mmu->func->init)
573 mmu->func->init(mmu);
574 return 0;
575}
576
577static void *
578nvkm_mmu_dtor(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
579{
580 struct nvkm_mmu *mmu = nvkm_mmu(subdev);
581 if (mmu->func->dtor)
582 return mmu->func->dtor(mmu);
583 return mmu;
584}
585
586static const struct nvkm_subdev_func
587nvkm_mmu = {
588 .dtor = nvkm_mmu_dtor,
589 .oneinit = nvkm_mmu_oneinit,
590 .init = nvkm_mmu_init,
591};
592
593void
594nvkm_mmu_ctor(const struct nvkm_mmu_func *func, struct nvkm_device *device,
595 int index, struct nvkm_mmu *mmu)
596{
597 nvkm_subdev_ctor(&nvkm_mmu, device, index, 0, &mmu->subdev);
598 mmu->func = func;
599 mmu->limit = func->limit;
600 mmu->dma_bits = func->dma_bits;
601 mmu->lpg_shift = func->lpg_shift;
602}
603
604int
605nvkm_mmu_new_(const struct nvkm_mmu_func *func, struct nvkm_device *device,
606 int index, struct nvkm_mmu **pmmu)
607{
608 if (!(*pmmu = kzalloc(sizeof(**pmmu), GFP_KERNEL)))
609 return -ENOMEM;
610 nvkm_mmu_ctor(func, device, index, *pmmu);
611 return 0;
612}
